data.text: @RepAnnieKuster Yea they are great, wtf are you still mandating vax for these people! Whatever happened to informed consent and ACTUAL SCIENCE. We now know how fos the government agencies are abt the vax. Leave our healthcare workers alone, let THEM make their own decisions. Dem 🤡🌎
@RepAnnieKuster A good example of your parties hypocrisy. https://t.co/PbDTwjMM6Z
@RepAnnieKuster Maybe he should tell the truth along with you.
